items.title: Based Booster Rollups — scale natively, compose synchronously
items.text: BBRs merge based rollups and booster rollups, scaling Ethereum dapps without redeployment on all L2s. They delegate transaction sequencing to Ethereum block builders and shard transaction execution and storage. This approach minimizes developer effort, redeployment costs, and centralized sequencer risks, solving liquidity fragmentation while reducing concerns.

items.title: Based Contestable Rollups — a modular, multi-proof design
items.text: Based Contestable Rollups (BCRs) unlock a new paradigm in Ethereum scaling. By combining the superpowers of Ethereum sequencing and integrating a contestation mechanism with a multi-proof design, BCRs maximally reduce transaction costs and increase decentralization.
